name: Youth Mental Health - Drop-In Services
description: This drop-in space aims to support LGBTQ+ youth who may be experiencing mild to moderate mental health symptoms like anxiety and depression. We’ll navigate life topics like transitioning, gender exploration, coming out, building self-esteem, and navigating relationships and conflict, among other situations. Free and confidential weekly mental health drop-in services for LGBTQ+ youth ages 16-24.
